plot: On the one-year anniversary of a car accident that she caused and which paralyzed a little girl named Ashley Cooper, a woman must journey through the nightmarish day from her state of shame...
plot_es: On the one-year anniversary of a car accident that she caused and which paralyzed a little girl named Ashley Cooper, a woman must journey through the nightmarish day from her state of shame...
plot_en: On the one-year anniversary of a car accident that she caused and which paralyzed a little girl named Ashley Cooper, a woman must journey through the nightmarish day from her state of shame...
